sections.content: Cross Country Ski Trail Conditions as of January 31, 2026 –

Bucks Run is groomed for skate and classic skiing. The connector trail between the ski center and Bucks Run is open. For your safety and the safety of our staff please adhere to Bucks Run hours.  Bucks Run is open Monday – Friday 12 pm – 7:45 pm and Saturday – Sunday 9 am – 7:45 pm, weather and conditions permitting.
– Trails are groomed. Open January 31st & February 1st.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Friday 4:15pm beautiful sunshine but deceiving at 10° F. Skated contractors back meadows loop and Hawk Hills (south golf course). Plenty of snow and more firm with buttery soft pole plants compared to Bucks which was nice. Hoping HM crew can get a full groom in tomorrow morning which will make a great Saturday. Cheers!

Stoney Creek Metropark (Shelby Township).conditions: Almost all trails have fresh park set tracks, but exposed areas were sometimes drifted over. There are some oak leave patches in the woods where deer have been digging for acorns. Despite these issues skiing was the best I've seen at Stoney in a long time,

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs has an 18 inch groomed in hardpack  base . Today a fresh groom of new snow made for hero skiing . It was cold : but LF 6 made it work . And the wind was light . Excellent !

nubsNob.liftsOpen: All 8 chairlifts, rope tow and conveyor
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be power-tilled and tracked this morning. Conditions are fantastic.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: Bring your sunglasses and get ready for an awesome day on the slopes. The snow surface is machine groomed with high quality snow thanks to sustained cold and frequent snowfall over the past few days. The temperature is forecast to nearly reach 20 degrees, which should feel like a heatwave compared to the last few days. NASTAR racing today at 12:30 p.m. on Birch Run. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food service and an espresso bar. The soup of the day is vegetable with Italian Sausage. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break at 4:30 p.m. to groom for night skiing. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
